properties.description: This pipeline is to run service now code and ingest data to snowflake

activities.name: SnowflakeIngestion-Failed
activities.description: This activity will add entry to audit table, once snowflake ingestion fails.

activities.name: LU-Metadata
activities.description: This activity will lookup the orchestration metadata for service now entries.

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from khc_orchestration_metadata where application_name = 'service_now' and dataset_group = 'snow' and active_ind = 'y'

activities.name: EP-SnowflakeIngestion
activities.description: This activity will invoke snowflake ingestion for service now

activities.name: EP-ServiceNow
activities.description: This acitivity invokes the service now api pull pipeline.

activities.name: ServiceNowAPIPull-Failed
activities.description: This activity will add entry to audit table in case service now api pull fails.

activities.name: LU-AuditFail
activities.description: This activity will lookup the audit table to see which tables have fails and hence helps in deleting files for which service now api pull has failed.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select
 o1.application_name
,o1.dataset_name
,o1.data_filename
,o1.container_name
,o1.stage_blob_name
from khc_orchestration_metadata o1
	,(select
	  dataset_name
	 ,max(last_extract_date) as last_extract_date
	 from khc_api_data_extract_audit_log 
	 where status = 'fail'
	 and application_name = 'service_now'
	 group by dataset_name) o2
	,(select
	  dataset_name
	 ,max(last_extract_date) as last_extract_date
	 from khc_api_data_extract_audit_log
	  where application_name = 'service_now'
	 group by dataset_name) o3
where o1.dataset_name		= o2.dataset_name
  and o2.last_extract_date >= o3.last_extract_date
  and o1.dataset_name		= o3.dataset_name
  and o1.active_ind			= 'y'
  and o1.application_name = 'service_now'
  and o1.dataset_group = 'snow'

activities.name: FE-TableFail
activities.description: This activity will delete the files from stage for those tables which failed during api pull from service now

activities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess_DLFileFail
activities.description: This activity will add success entry once delete file fail  activity succeeds.

activities.name: IF-NotError
activities.description: This activity checks whether the delete file activity gets an error message.

ifFalseActivities.name: SP-ActivityError_DLFileFail
ifFalseActivities.description: This activity will add failure entry once delete file fail  activity fails.

ifFalseActivities.name: CP-ReraiseErrorFileFail
ifFalseActivities.description: This activity will reraise the error file

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess_DeleteFileFail
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity will add success entry once delete file fail  activity succeeds.

ifTrueActivities.name: CP-Empty02
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity copies the empty file

activities.name: CP-EmptyFile
activities.description: This activity copies the empty file

activities.name: Delete_after_check_table_fail
activities.description: This activity will check whether a table fails while pulling data from service now

ifTrueActivities.name: DL-FilesFail
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity delete the stage location for those tables which failed while pulling data from service now.

activities.name: FileDeletion-Failed
activities.description: This activity will add entry to audit table in case file deletion fails.

activities.name: FE-TableAll
activities.description: This activity will delete the files from stage location once dbt processing succeeds.

activities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess_DLAll01
activities.description: This activity will add success entry once delete file activity succeeds.

activities.name: IF-NotErrorAll
activities.description: This activity checks whether the delete file activity get error message

ifFalseActivities.name: SP-ActivityError_DLAll
ifFalseActivities.description: This activity will add failure entry once delete file activity fails.

ifFalseActivities.name: CP-ReraiseError02
ifFalseActivities.description: This activity will reraise the error file

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess_DLAll02
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity will add success entry once delete file activity succeeds.

activities.name: Delete_after_check_dbt_success
activities.description: This activity checks whether the dbt processing is successful or not

ifTrueActivities.name: DL-FilesAll
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity deletes the file from stage after dbt success

activities.name: FileDeletionPostDBT-Failed
activities.description: This activity will add entry to audit table in case file deletion fails post successful completion of dbt processing

activities.name: Email Validation If Condition
activities.description: This validates if we have any output coming from audit table and invoke email to business based on the content of the output of audit table.

activities.name: PL_KHCDE_SERVICE_NOW_DBT_PROCESSING
activities.description: This activity will invoke dbt processing for service now.

activities.name: SERVICE_NOW_DBT-Success
activities.description: Insert pipeline activity with status= success to the khc_audit_log_detail table

activities.name: Pipeline_Start
activities.description: This Activity logs starting of pipeline in khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: LU-Metadata_Audit_Table_Validation
activities.description: This activity will lookup the orchestration metadata for it4it_service_now and rnd_service_now entries

sqlReaderQuery.value:
with temp as(
select dataset_name,max(last_extract_date) as last_extract_date from [dbo].[khc_api_data_extract_audit_log]
where application_name='service_now' and dataset_group='snow'
and dataset_name in (select distinct dataset_name from khc_orchestration_metadata where application_name = 'service_now' and dataset_group='snow' and active_ind = 'y')
group by dataset_name)
,
final_output as (
select log_table.dataset_name,  api_header_record_count ,status ,cast(log_table.last_extract_date as varchar) last_extract_date from
[dbo].[khc_api_data_extract_audit_log] log_table inner join temp
on log_table.dataset_name=temp.dataset_name
and log_table.last_extract_date=temp.last_extract_date
where status<>'success'
)
select cast((
select dataset_name as td,  api_header_record_count as td,status as td,last_extract_date as td from
final_output
FOR XML RAW('tr'),ROOT('table'),ELEMENTS,TYPE) as nvarchar(max)) as output_result

activities.name: Pipeline_Successful
activities.description: This Activity logs completion of pipeline in khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: set_email_success_failure
activities.description: This activity will set the email variables.

activities.name: ServiceNow-DBT-Processing-Failed
activities.description: This activity will add entry to audit table, once service now dbt processing failed

activities.name: LU-Metadata-it4it-rnd-service_now
activities.description: This activity will lookup the orchestration metadata for service now entries.

sqlReaderQuery.value: select distinct application_name , dataset_group from khc_orchestration_metadata where application_name in ( 'it4it_service_now','rnd_service_now','procurement_service_now','man_service_now') and active_ind = 'y'

activities.name: FE-TableAll-it4it-rnd-service_now
activities.description: This pipeline runs the dbt processing for it4it_service_now and rnd_service_now.

activities.name: DBT_PROCESSING_FOR_IT4IT_AND_RND
activities.description: This activity will call dbt processing pipeline to process IT4IT and RND tables/views for service now

activities.name: IT4IT_AND_RND_DBT-Success
activities.description: Insert pipeline activity with status= success to the khc_audit_log_detail table

activities.name: IT4IT_AND_RND-DBT-Failed
activities.description: Insert pipeline activity with status= fail to the khc_audit_log_detail table
